Datasource.Parameter: (select way,"natural",waterway,landuse,coalesce("name:lt","name") "name" from planet_osm_polygon where landuse = 'reservoir' or "natural" in ('water','wetland') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as water_areas
(select way,waterway,coalesce("name:lt","name") "name" from planet_osm_line where waterway='river' ) as water_lines

(select way,waterway,disused,lock,coalesce("name:lt","name") "name", case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from planet_osm_line where waterway in ('weir','river','canal','derelict_canal','stream','drain','ditch','wadi') and (bridge is null or bridge not in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct')) order by z_order ) as water_lines
(select way from planet_osm_polygon where leisure ='marina') as marinas
(select way,man_made from planet_osm_polygon where man_made in ('pier','breakwater','groyne')) as piers
(select way,man_made from planet_osm_line where man_made in ('pier','breakwater','groyne')) as piers
(select way from planet_osm_line where route='ferry' ) as routes
(select way,barrier,"natural",man_made from planet_osm_line where /*barrier is not null or*/ "natural" in ('hedge','cliff') /*or man_made='embankment'*/) as roads

(select way,"addr:housenumber" from planet_osm_polygon where "addr:housenumber" is not null and "addr:contact" is null and building is not null union select way,"addr:housenumber" from planet_osm_point where "addr:housenumber" is not null and "addr:contact" is null ) as housenumbers

(select way,"addr:housename" from planet_osm_polygon where "addr:housename" is not null and building is not null union select way,"addr:housename" from planet_osm_point where "addr:housename" is not null ) as housenames
(select way,highway,horse,foot,bicycle from planet_osm_line where highway in ('bridleway','footway','cycleway','path') and tunnel in ('yes','true','1', 'building_passage') order by z_order) as roads
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and tunnel in ('yes','true','1','building_passage')) as tracks
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks

(select way,highway,horse,bicycle,foot,construction,aeroway,cycleway,"cycleway:right","cycleway:left",null sidewalk, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1','building_passage') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1','viaduct') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge, case when railway in ('spur','siding') or (railway='rail' and service in ('spur','siding','yard')) then 'spur-siding-yard'::text else railway end as railway, case when service in ('parking_aisle','drive-through','driveway') then 'INT-minor'::text else service end as service, case when surface in ('asphalt', 'paved') then 'paved' else 'unpaved' end as surface from planet_osm_line where (highway is not null and highway not in ('proposed', 'construction')) or aeroway in ('runway','taxiway') or railway in ('light_rail','narrow_gauge','funicular','rail','subway','tram','spur','siding','platform','disused','abandoned','construction','miniature') order by z_order) as roads

(select way,highway, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1','building_passage') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel, case when railway='preserved' and service in ('spur','siding','yard') then 'INT-preserved-ssy'::text else railway end as railway from planet_osm_roads where highway is not null or (railway is not null and railway!='preserved' and (service is null or service not in ('spur','siding','yard'))) or railway='preserved' order by z_order ) as roads
(select way,name from planet_osm_line where waterway='canal' and bridge in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct') order by z_order) as water

Layer.name: planet roads text osm low zoom

Datasource.Parameter: (select way,highway,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_roads where highway in ('motorway','trunk','primary') and ref is not null ) as roads
(select way,ref,name from planet_osm_point where highway='motorway_junction' ) as junctions

(select way,highway,aeroway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL and (name is not null or (((highway is not null and highway not in ('proposed', 'construction')) or aeroway is not null) and ref is not null)) and (route is null or route not in ('bus', 'trolleybus', 'road')) ) as roads
(select way from planet_osm_line where "power"='line') as power_line
(select way from planet_osm_line where "power"='minor_line') as power_minorline
(select way from planet_osm_point where power='tower') as power_towers
(select way from planet_osm_point where power='pole') as power_poles
(select way,admin_level from planet_osm_roads where "boundary"='administrative' and admin_level = '2' ) as admin
(select way,way_area,name,boundary from planet_osm_polygon where boundary='national_park') as boundary
(select way,name,tourism from planet_osm_polygon where tourism='theme_park') as theme_park
(select way,place,name,ref from planet_osm_point where place in ('country','state') ) as placenames
(select way,place,name,ref from planet_osm_point where place = 'city' and capital='yes' ) as placenames

(select way,place,name,rank from planet_osm_point where place in ('city','metropolis','town','large_town','small_town') and (capital is null or capital != 'yes') order by cast (coalesce(rank, '20') as int) asc ) as placenames

(select way,place,name from planet_osm_point where place in ('suburb','village','large_village','hamlet','locality','isolated_dwelling','farm') order by cast (coalesce(population, '0') as int) desc ) as placenames
